totalAlerts.description: Total number of alerts based on the search condition

readAlerts.description: Total number of alert messages marked as read based on the search condition

target.description: The name of the user name, group name or role name of the destination where the alert has to be sent. If target type is USERNAME, the target will contain the User name. If target type is ROLE, the target will contain the Role name. If target type is GROUP, the target will contain the Group name.

alertTypeId.description: Unique id assigned by the system to identify the Alert Type

updateVersion.description: updateVersion is used to ensure the integrity of the data and to prevent concurrent updates on the same record.

id.description: Unique id assigned by the system to identify the Alert

referenceId.description: ID refers to the origination of the Alert like Portfolio ID, Goal ID, Product Code, Client ID, etc

referenceType.description: Refers to the type of ID in the referenceID field, for example, Portfolio ID, Product Code, Client ID etc

severity.description: Severity of the alert (used to 'decorate' the alert itself). For example, GREEN, AMBER, RED

businessId.description: Business Identifier field will contain the combination of Target ID, Alert ID, Reference ID, etc that will used in the locating the specific entries when required

source.description: The source system from where the Alert was triggered

processedDate.description: processedDate is the date when a record in the alert table was processed and recs created in the alert repository table.

notes.description: Comments attached to the alert. This will be visible in the Alert Viewer

customBody.description: Message with exact Content without place holders
customBody.example: This is the body of the Alert Message

customSubject.description: Subject to be displayed for the alert without place holders
customSubject.example: This is the subject of the Alert Message

createdBy.description: The Id of the user who has created the Alert message

createdDate.description: The date on which the Alert is created

validFrom.description: The date from which the alert is valid

url.description: Hyperlink provides the direct access to the alert's location

context.description:
Alert can contain either Custom Subject or Custom Body or both and it can contain the placeholders. Values for the placeholders should be defined in the 'Context' field. Example:
Assume Custom Subject was passed as "Information about your Portfolio <$Port>" for an Alert
'Context' field in the Alert table should have the information like $Port=123456 and system will use this value to replace the placeholder when formatting the exact message in step 2a

alertTypeId.description: Unique id assigned by the system to identify the Alert Type

alertTargetDTOs.description: The list of Alert targets for this Alert

AlertListContainerDTO.description: The collection list object of the Alerts

message.example: Dear <$Title> <$FirstName> <$LastName>, You have received an Alert about Rebalancing your Portfolio. Login to your application for details.

channel.description: The channel for which the Alert Template is applicable. For example, SMS, EMAIL, UI

mimeType.description: MIME stands for "Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions. Its a way of identifying files on the Internet according to their nature and format. For example, using the Content-type header value defined in a HTTP response, the browser can open the file with the proper extension/plugin.

address.description: The email address or phone number of the user where the alert number is sent

createdDate.description: The date on which the alert is created

resent.description: Indicates whether the message will be saved to resend table

id.description: Unique id assigned by the system to identify the Alert Repository

target.description: The name of the user name, group name or role name of the destination where the alert has to be sent. If target type is USERNAME, the target will contain the User name. If target type is ROLE, the target will contain the Role name. If target type is GROUP, the target will contain the Group name.

severity.description: Severity of the alert (used to decorate the alert itself). For example, GREEN, AMBER, RED

starred.description: To indicate whether the alert is to be marked as Important

validFrom.description: The date from which the alert is valid

updatedBy.description: The id of the user who has updated the Alert Message

updatedDate.description: The date on which the Alert is updated

alertRepository.description: The list of Alert Repository DTO

AlertRepositorySearchFilterDTO.description: The DTO contains fields which can be used to search specific entries or a group of entries from the Alert Repository entity.

endCreatedDate.description: The "to" value of the Created date

startValidToDate.description: The "from" value of the Valid To date

endValidToDate.description: The "to" value of the Valid To date

startCreatedDate.description: The from value of the Created date

endCreatedDate.description: The to value of the Created date

endValidTo.description: The to value of the Valid To date

startProcessedDate.description: The from value of the Processed date

endProcessedDate.description: The to value of the Processed date

alertTypeId.description: Unique id assigned by the system to identify the Alert

businessId.description: Business Identifier field will contain the combination of Target ID, Alert ID, Reference ID, etc that will used in the locating the specific entries when required

severity.description: Severity of the alert (used to decorate the alert itself). For example, GREEN, AMBER, RED

AlertTargetDTO.description: The Alert Target DTO holds the list of targets to which the specific alert has to be sent. Data source that initiates the alert can insert one record in the Alert table with multiple records in the Target table. Example: Bank wants to send the same alert to both Customer and his/her advisor. In this case, create one record in the Alert Table and create two entries in the Target table for the Customer and Advisor respectively

updateVersion.description: updateVersion is used to ensure the integrity of the data and to prevent concurrent updates on the same record.

id.description: Unique id assigned by the system to identify the Alert Target

alertId.description: Unique id assigned by the system to identify the Alert

target.description: The name of the user name, group name or role name of the destination where the alert has to be sent. If target type is USERNAME, the target will contain the User name. If target type is ROLE, the target will contain the Role name. If target type is GROUP, the target will contain the Group name.

targetType.description: The type of the target where the alert has to be sent. For example, USERNAME, ROLE, GROUP etc

AlertTargetListContainerDTO.description: The list of Alert Target Entities

AlertTypeDTO.description: The AlertTypeDTO entity holds the type of the Alert under each Alert Category (for example, Alert Name, Alert Description and Alert Severity)

updateVersion.description: updateVersion is used to ensure the integrity of the data and to prevent concurrent updates on the same record.

id.description: Unique id assigned by the system to identify the Alert Type

description.description: The short description of the specific Alert Type
description.example: Alerts in case of completion of the chosen Goal for a portfolio

categoryId.description: The unique identifier of the Alert Category associated with this Alert Type

severity.description: Severity associated with the Alert type indicated as RED, GREEN, AMBER

AlertTypeListContainerDTO.description: The collection list object for the the Alert Type entity

CategoryDTO.description: The CategoryDTO entity holds the property of the Alert Category, (for example, Category name and Category Description)

updateVersion.description: updateVersion is used to ensure the integrity of the data and to prevent concurrent updates on the same record.

id.description: Unique id assigned by the system to identify the Category

name.description: Name of the Category of the alert.

description.description: The short description of the specific Category

CategoryListContainerDTO.description: A list collection object for the Alert Category DTO

NotificationRuleDTO.description: Notification Rules are used to send the Alert Notification via. SMS, EMAIL and PUSH and can be configured at Group, Role and User levels with the frequency mode and period for every Alert Type and Channel. Configuration is mandatory in order to send the Alert Notification.

updateVersion.description: updateVersion is used to ensure the integrity of the data and to prevent concurrent updates on the same record.

id.description: Unique id assigned by the system to identify the Notification Rule

alertTypeId.description: Unique id assigned by the system to identify the Alert Type

target.description: The name of the user name, group name or role name of the destination where the alert has to be sent. If target type is USERNAME, the target will contain the User name. If target type is ROLE, the target will contain the Role name. If target type is GROUP, the target will contain the Group name.

targetType.description: The type of the target where the alert has to be sent. For example, USERNAME, ROLE, GROUP etc

channel.description: The channel through which the alert has to be sent. For example, SMS, EMAIL etc

frequencyMode.description: The frequency at which the alert has to be sent. Example, "ONCE", "DAYS" etc

frequencyPeriod.description: The number of iterations of the frequency which has to be considered while sending the alert. Dependent on the frequencyMode value.

createdBy.description: The name of the user who has created the the Notification Rule entry

createdDate.description: The date on which the Notification Rule entry was created

updatedBy.description: The name of the user who has updated the the Notification Rule entry

updatedDate.description: The date on which the Notification Rule entry was created

NotificationRuleListContainerDTO.description:
A list collection object for the Notification Rule DTO
Notification Rules are used to send the Alert Notification via. SMS, EMAIL and PUSH and can be configured at Group, Role and User levels with the frequency mode and period for every Alert Type and Channel. Configuration is mandatory in order to send the Alert Notification.

NotificationRuleSearchFilterDTO.description:
Search variables for the Notification Rule DTO.
Notification Rules are used to send the Alert Notification via. SMS, EMAIL and PUSH and can be configured at Group, Role and User levels with the frequency mode and period for every Alert Type and Channel. Configuration is mandatory in order to send the Alert Notification.

target.description: The name of the user name, group name or role name of the destination where the alert has to be sent. If target type is USERNAME, the target will contain the User name. If target type is ROLE, the target will contain the Role name. If target type is GROUP, the target will contain the Group name.

alertTypeId.description: The unique identifier of the Alert Type associated with this Alert Template

TemplateDTO.description: Alert templates define the content and appearance of alerts. The TemplateDTO defines the properties of the Alert Template.

updateVersion.description: updateVersion is used to ensure the integrity of the data and to prevent concurrent updates on the same record.

id.description: Unique id assigned by the system to identify the Template

body.description: The format of the template defining the look and feel of the Alert and the placeholders for the variables.
body.example: Dear <$Title> <$FirstName> <$LastName>, You have received an Alert about Rebalancing your Portfolio. Login to your application for details.

mimeType.description: MIME stands for "Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions. It's a way of identifying files on the Internet according to their nature and format. For example, using the "Content-type" header value defined in a HTTP response, the browser can open the file with the proper extension/plugin.

channel.description: The channel for which the Alert Template is applicable. For example, SMS, EMAIL, UI

subject.description: The Subject to be used while generating the Alert. This is applicable only for Channel as EMAIL

validFrom.description: Indicates the date and timestamp from which the Alert is valid.

alertTypeId.description: The unique identifier of the Alert Type associated with this Alert Template

TemplateListContainerDTO.description: The Collection list object of the Template Entity (TemplateDTO)
